## Slides.removeSlide() method

Removes a slide from the slide show

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeSlide(slideIndexOrUrl: number | string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  slideIndexOrUrl | number \| string | The index of the slide to remove or the url of the slide to remove. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
